projects: Core project registry — tracks all ICDEV-managed software projects with classification, impact level, and ATO status
agents: Multi-agent system registry — 10 agents (orchestrator, architect, builder, compliance, security, infrastructure, MBSE, modernization, knowledge, monitor)
audit_trail: Append-only immutable audit log (NIST 800-53 AU) — every significant action is recorded here
hook_events: Claude Code hook event log — captures tool usage, notifications, session lifecycle for observability
agent_executions: Agent subprocess execution log — tracks Claude Code CLI invocations with tokens, duration, retry status
poam_items: Plan of Action & Milestones — tracks security weaknesses and remediation timelines
stig_findings: Security Technical Implementation Guide findings with severity categories
sbom_records: Software Bill of Materials records (CycloneDX format)
deployments: Deployment tracking — dev/staging/prod with rollback support
knowledge_patterns: Self-healing knowledge base — failure patterns, remediation, confidence scores
boundary_impact_assessments: ATO boundary impact analysis — GREEN/YELLOW/ORANGE/RED tier system
supply_chain_vendors: Supply chain vendor registry with SCRM risk tiers
intake_sessions: RICOAS requirements intake sessions with readiness scoring
intake_requirements: Individual requirements captured during intake with quality scores
safe_decomposition: SAFe hierarchy decomposition — epics, capabilities, features, stories
nlq_queries: NLQ query history — audit trail for natural language database queries
